thread.section_title: Wheelbasealloys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wheelbasealloys | www.wheelbasealloys.com
thread.title: Rodney Davidson

author: Rodney Davidson
title: Rodney Davidson
text: A truly fantastic experience. They do what they say. I ordered wheels and tyres and they were here within two days. Had a question on locking wheel bolts that they answered and then provided said bolts at 1/4 Price of other suppliers. Again arriving within two days of order. I am usually wary of online ordering but these guys proved to be helpful, supportive and keen to please.
